SELECT MID_ING_NAME, CC_ING_PRICE, CC_ING.CC_ING_WEIGHT, UNIT.UNIT_NAME FROM CC_ING JOIN MID_ING ON MID_ING.MID_ING_ID = CC_ING.MID_ING_ID JOIN UNIT ON UNIT.UNIT_ID = CC_ING.UNIT_ID WHERE CC_ID = #{cc_id}

SELECT CC_CO.CC_CO_ID, U.U_PROFILE_IMG, GRADE.GRADE_IMG, U.U_NICKNAME, CC_CO.CC_CO_DATE, CC_CO.CC_CO_CONTENT FROM CC_CO JOIN U ON U.U_ID = CC_CO.U_ID JOIN GRADE ON U.GRADE_ID = GRADE.GRADE_ID WHERE CC_ID = #{cc_id}
